thread.title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama hosting education event
thread.title_full: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama hosting education event

author: TOM WITHERS
title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama hosting education event
text:
Ron Schwane LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama hosting education event 
FILE - This is a Sept. 28, 2015, file photo showing Cleveland Cavaliers' LeBron James posed during the NBA team's media day Independence, Ohio. (AP Photo/Ron Schwane, File) Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 7:10 am LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama hosting education event Associated Press | 
AKRON, Ohio (AP) — LeBron James is teaming up with Michelle Obama to celebrate the importance of secondary education at a private event at the University of Akron. 
The NBA superstar and first lady will host thousands of children and their parents Wednesday at the school. The kids are from the programs James has started through his family's foundation.
